name: Bome MIDI Translator Project
summary: A BMTP file is a project created by the Classic and Pro versions of Bome MIDI Translator, a MIDI and keystroke mapping tool. It contains various information about a project, including MIDI input and output ports, MIDI thru connections, presets, and metadata , such as the version and name of the author. MIDI Translator users save projects as BMTP files to preserve their progress.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
